field: Peer support services in specialty courts
value: Specialty court programs incorporate peer support into their service delivery.  Mental‑health court handbooks require participants to attend peer support meetings, and federal grants (e.g., SAMHSA grant to ARHP) fund peer recovery specialists for adult drug courts.
notes: The mental‑health court orientation in Benton County mandates peer support meetings, demonstrating programmatic reliance on peer support.  The ARHP grant emphasises deploying Peer Recovery Specialists within court programs, confirming that peer support services are not only allowed but actively integrated and federally funded.
